summary: Completed comprehensive testing of ReceiptLens expense tracking application after fixes. All major functionality is working correctly. Backend API endpoints are fully functional (19/19 tests passed). Frontend pages load correctly with proper authentication flow. Fixed critical receipt scanning API issue and verified AI-powered data extraction works with 95% confidence. Mobile-responsive design confirmed.

design_issues.issue: Console warnings about chart width/height being -1, likely due to container sizing

passed_tests: Backend health endpoints (/api/, /api/health) - 100% success
Categories endpoint returns all 10 expected categories
Authentication flow with session tokens - fully functional
Expense CRUD operations (create, read, update, delete) - all working
Analytics summary endpoint with proper data aggregation
Report generation (PDF/Excel) with proper formatting
Tags endpoint functionality
Receipt scanning with AI-powered data extraction (95% confidence)
Upload receipt image endpoint
Login page loads correctly with Google OAuth button
Dashboard page with charts, analytics, and user data
Expenses page with fixed Select component (no more empty value errors)
Reports page with date pickers, format selection, and category filters
Upload modal functionality and integration
Mobile responsive design (390px width) - layout adapts properly
Navigation between pages works correctly
Session-based authentication with proper cookie handling
Search and filter functionality on expenses page
Bulk operations (select all, bulk delete) working
Real-time data updates after CRUD operations
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor optimization: Fix chart container sizing to eliminate console warnings about negative width/height values. This is a low-priority cosmetic issue that doesn't affect functionality.
